title: Ticket #2436: condor_q makes excessive queries to the collector
description:
Igor noticed that in some cases, condor_q makes two collector queries: 

   condor_q -name <schedd> <jobid>

But not in this case: condor_q -name <schedd> -xml <jobid>

It also queries twice even when -address is supplied on the command line, and if it fails to find the schedd in the query, it refuses to use the address it was given.
